dismantler.Name: Dismantler
dismantler.Effect: Grants a [25/30/35/40/45]% chance of dealing [50/75/100/125/150]% more damage to appendage with Melee Arts.

cqc master.Name: CQC Master
cqc master.Effect: Boosts critical chance by [30/35/40/45/50]% when triggering a melee combo.

healing aura.Name: Healing Aura
healing aura.Effect: Recovers [12/14/16/18/20]% of your HP when you use an aura.

weapon guard.Name: Weapon Guard
weapon guard.Effect: Boosts physical resistance by [12/14/16/18/20] when wielding a melee weapon.

blazing auto.Name: Blazing Auto
blazing auto.Effect: Grants a [10/12/14/16/18]% chance to inflict Blaze [I/I/II/II/III] when melee auto-attacking.

theroid slayer.Name: Theroid Slayer
theroid slayer.Effect: Boosts damage to theroid enemies by [30/35/40/45/50]%.

yamato spirit.Name: Yamato Spirit
yamato spirit.Effect: Boosts TP by [20/30/40/50/60] when using a Melee Art; double that if you have an aura active.

aggro boost.Name: Aggro Boost
aggro boost.Effect: Boosts damage to taunted enemies by [20/40/60/80/100]%.

grand procession.Name: Grand Procession
grand procession.Effect: Boosts entire party's TP by [300/350/400/450/500] when activating Overdrive.

thermal shield.Name: Thermal Shield
thermal shield.Effect: Boosts thermal resistance by [12/14/16/18/20] when wielding a melee weapon.

shield screen.Name: Shield Screen
shield screen.Effect: Reduces damage by [10/15/20/25/30]% when wielding a shield.

rising renewal.Name: Rising Renewal
rising renewal.Effect: Boosts HP recovery by [10/15/20/25/30]% when revived.

trauma tension.Name: Trauma Tension
trauma tension.Effect: Grants a 15% chance of receiving [50/75/100/125/150] TP when taking damage.

dirty fighter.Name: Dirty Fighter
dirty fighter.Effect: Boosts Melee Art damage by [20/40/60/80/100]% to enemies inflicted with Topple.

stand strong.Name: Stand Strong
stand strong.Effect: Boosts resistance to Stagger, Topple, Knockback, and Launch by [20/40/60/80/100] when wielding a shield.

machine gunner.Name: Machine Gunner
machine gunner.Effect: Boosts ranged damage by [20/40/60/80/100]% when fighting two or more enemies.

heatseeker.Name: Heatseeker
heatseeker.Effect: Boosts critical chance by [50/60/70/80/100]% when attacking enemies inflicted with Blaze.

agile gunslinger.Name: Agile Gunslinger
agile gunslinger.Effect: Boosts evasion by [12/14/16/18/20]% when wielding a ranged weapon.

background noise.Name: Background Noise
background noise.Effect: Boosts damage by [25/50/75/100/125]% when using Melee Arts from behind.

combo gunner.Name: Combo Gunner
combo gunner.Effect: Boosts damage by [25/50/75/100/125]% when triggering ranged combos.

third eye.Name: Third Eye
third eye.Effect: Boosts TP by [20/30/40/50/60] when using a Ranged Art; double that if you have an aura active.

master edge.Name: Master Edge
master edge.Effect: Boosts critical chance by [5/6/7/8/10]% when wielding a melee weapon.

deep fang.Name: Deep Fang
deep fang.Effect: Reduces enemy debuff resistance by [10/15/20/25/30]% when attacking from the side.

mortal enemy.Name: Mortal Enemy
mortal enemy.Effect: Boosts damage to humanoid enemies by [30/35/40/45/50]%.

trigger happy.Name: Trigger Happy
trigger happy.Effect: Reduces an Art's cooldown by [30/35/40/45/50]% when triggering a ranged combo.

lifeline.Name: Lifeline
lifeline.Effect: Recovers [10/15/20/25/30]% of your HP when HP is at 50% or less and you use an aura.

night vision.Name: Night Vision
night vision.Effect: Boosts damage by [20/40/60/80/100]% during the nighttime.

zero lapse.Name: Zero Lapse
zero lapse.Effect: Reduces cooldown for melee auto-attacks by [30/35/40/45/50]%.

red zone.Name: Red Zone
red zone.Effect: Boosts critical chance by [20/25/30/35/40]% during Overdrive.

crisis catalyst.Name: Crisis Catalyst
crisis catalyst.Effect: Boosts critical chance by [10/15/20/25/30]% when HP is 50% or less. Effect doubles when HP is 25% or less.

blood carnival.Name: Blood Carnival
blood carnival.Effect: Grants a [5/10/15/20/25]% chance of converting [4/6/8/10/12]% of damage dealt to HP when melee auto-attacking.

phantom counter.Name: Phantom Counter
phantom counter.Effect: Boosts your Overdrive count by [4/6/8/10/12] when activating Overdrive.

killshot.Name: Killshot
killshot.Effect: Boosts critical chance for ranged auto-attacks by [5/6/7/8/10]%.

electric guard.Name: Electric Guard
electric guard.Effect: Boosts electric resistance by [12/14/16/18/20] when wielding a melee weapon.

knock 'n' shock.Name: Knock 'n' Shock
knock 'n' shock.Effect: Grants a [10/12/14/16/18]% chance of inflicting Shock [I/I/II/II/III] when using Melee Arts.

fleet feet.Name: Fleet Feet
fleet feet.Effect: Boosts evasion by [10/15/20/25/30]% when wielding a melee weapon.

piscinoid slayer.Name: Piscinoid Slayer
piscinoid slayer.Effect: Boosts damage to piscinoid enemies by [30/35/40/45/50]%.

unstoppable.Name: Unstoppable
unstoppable.Effect: Boosts resistances to Stagger, Topple, Knockback, and Launch by [20/40/60/80/100] when sprinting.

quick reload.Name: Quick Reload
quick reload.Effect: Reduces cooldown for ranged auto-attacks by [30/35/40/45/50]%.

conductive strike.Name: Conductive Strike
conductive strike.Effect: Boosts electric damage by [200/225/250/275/300]% to enemies inflicted with Shock.

electric flesh.Name: Electric Flesh
electric flesh.Effect: Grants a [10/15/20/25/30]% chance of dealing electric spike damage when taking a hit.

tp overdrive.Name: TP Overdrive

beam guard.Name: Beam Guard
beam guard.Effect: Boosts beam resistance by [12/14/16/18/20] when wielding a ranged weapon.

buff heal.Name: Buff Heal
buff heal.Effect: Recovers [100/200/300/400/500] HP when receiving a buff.

healing touch.Name: Healing Touch
healing touch.Effect: Boosts the HP recovery of party members you revive by [30/35/40/45/50]%.

brain wall.Name: Brain Wall
brain wall.Effect: Boosts resistance to Sleep, Control, and Slow Arts by [20/40/60/80/100] when you have an aura active.

gentle approach.Name: Gentle Approach
gentle approach.Effect: Grants a [50/60/70/80/100]% chance of not waking up a sleeping enemy when auto-attacking.

king's decree.Name: King's Decree
king's decree.Effect: Reduces enemy Control resistance by [10/15/20/25/30]% and raises debuff tier by 1.

unpleasant dream.Name: Unpleasant Dream
unpleasant dream.Effect: Boosts damage to sleeping enemies by [50/75/100/125/150]%.

core crusher.Effect: Negates appendage damage from your Ether attacks, but boosts primary damage by [50/75/100/125/150]%.

ether guard.Name: Ether Guard

well-weathered.Name: Well-Weathered

resistant flesh.Effect: Boosts resistance to all debuffs by [12/15/18/21/24]%.

mechanoid slayer.Name: Mechanoid Slayer
mechanoid slayer.Effect: Boosts damage to mechanoid enemies by +[30/35/40/45/50]%.

supreme sword.Effect: Boosts damage by [20/40/60/80/100]% when triggering melee combos.

gravity guard.Name: Gravity Guard
gravity guard.Effect: Boosts gravity resistance by [12/14/16/18/20] when wielding a ranged weapon.

fast forward.Name: Fast Forward
fast forward.Effect: Reduces an Art's cooldown by [10/20/30/40/50]% when triggering a melee combo.

stellar entry.Name: Stellar Entry

synchrony.Effect: Boosts Skell melee attack, ranged attack, melee & ranged accuracy, potential, and evasion by [4/6/8/10/12]%.
